trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Gulf Shores
There was one other sighting in Gulf Shores on or around March 31st 1990
divs: Sighting Details When I first noticed it, It was a small dot coming from the vicinty of West Beach area.as it got closer I saw it was a Giant fireball with a tail streaming behind it..Weird.. never fell just stayed level and went on past us and went out of site still following coastline.. Did anyone else report this.... I Swear It is the Truth.... I have told people about this over the years... And by the way my husband witnessed it also.... We had made the comment... YOU see that ,,, You see it too? Man what the F is that..... (sorry ,dude but that was what was said_ my husband doesn't tell anyone about it.... guess he doesn't want to be labeled Nuts..... But I know what we saw....it continued on into the Fla. coast ....
Summary: Flew level about 50 above water following coast from far western point to where we were sitting enjoying nite at Ala Point Bridge stayed out just off of beachline over water I'd say 30 ft or so . It seemed to be just like I said following the coastline.
